product_overview: GuillenIA is a comprehensive SaaS platform for creating, managing, and monitoring AI conversational agents integrated with WhatsApp, enabling businesses to automate customer service, schedule appointments, generate reports, and manage multiple organizations through an intuitive interface with real-time metrics.
core_goals: Enable businesses of all sizes to deploy intelligent automated customer service via WhatsApp without requiring advanced technical knowledge.
Provide tools for creation, configuration, and management of AI agents with customizable prompts and templates.
Facilitate real-time conversation handling between customers and AI agents with multi-format message support.
Offer scheduling and calendar integration for automated and manual appointment management.
Deliver comprehensive reporting and analytics with automated and custom report generation.
Support multi-organization management with secure authentication and role-based access control.
Ensure scalability, security, and high availability to support thousands of users and high message throughput.
Provide tiered subscription plans with usage limits and automated enforcement.
key_features: User authentication and multi-organization management using Supabase Auth with roles and secure session management.
Agent creation and management with OpenAI API integration, including customizable prompts, templates, and adjustable AI parameters.
WhatsApp integration via Evolution API with encrypted credential storage, real-time message webhook processing, and automatic responses.
Conversation interface mimicking WhatsApp style, supporting message history, search, filtering, and status management.
Appointment scheduling system with manual and automatic creation, visual calendar, status color coding, and bidirectional Google Calendar sync.
Automated and custom reporting system with daily cron jobs, CSV export, and email delivery functionality.
Dashboard presenting real-time statistics on active agents, messages, conversations, and user satisfaction with planned advanced visualizations.
Subscription plans with limits on agents and message counts, usage monitoring, alerts, and automatic blocking on overuse.
Background job queue processing for asynchronous tasks such as report generation, calendar sync, data cleanup, and email sending.
Mobile-responsive design with accessibility compliance and intuitive user experience themes focusing on simplicity and visual feedback.
user_flow_summary: New user onboarding starts at the landing page, proceeding to registration via email/password, organization creation, and plan selection before redirecting to the dashboard with a guided tutorial.

Agent creation flow allows choosing either a pre-configured template or building from scratch, including prompt customization, AI parameter setup, OpenAI agent creation, connection configuration for WhatsApp and Google Calendar, connection testing, and activation for message processing.

Incoming WhatsApp messages are routed via Evolution API webhook, matched to the corresponding agent and conversation context, processed with OpenAI to generate responses, and replied automatically while updating the conversation records and real-time metrics.
Users can manually manage conversations through a chat interface with full message history, visual status markers, search and filter options, and conversation archiving or closing.
Scheduling flow includes manual appointment creation with validations and calendar visualization, synchronization with Google Calendar events, and automatic notifications and reminders.
Reporting includes automated daily report generation and on-demand custom reports with options to filter by date and agent, view metrics on screen, download CSVs, and receive scheduled email reports.
validation_criteria: Users can create AI agents from scratch or templates, with all mandatory fields validated and errors clearly indicated.
Agents are automatically created in OpenAI and can be activated or deactivated after successful WhatsApp connection tests that securely encrypt credentials.
The system processes incoming WhatsApp messages by generating and sending responses automatically, storing conversation data, and updating metrics in real time.
Dashboard metrics reflect live data accurately with appropriate loading states; advanced graphical visualizations are implemented and functional.
Daily reports are generated automatically and can be downloaded; custom report generation and CSV download works correctly with email scheduling operational.
Authentication and authorization protect all sensitive routes with session persistence and Row Level Security ensuring data isolation by organization.
Subscription plan limits on agent creation and message volume are enforced with warnings and automatic blocking if limits are exceeded.
Background job processing supports retries, status tracking, and detailed logs for tasks such as report generation, calendar sync, and email delivery.
The user interface is responsive and accessible across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices, providing intuitive workflows and interactive feedback.
